title: Refactor entire codebase for TypeScript migration
body:
# Major Refactoring

This is a large PR that migrates the entire codebase from JavaScript to TypeScript.

## Scope
- 150+ files changed
- Added type definitions for all modules
- Updated build configuration
- Migrated tests to TypeScript
- Updated documentation

## Breaking Changes
- Node.js 16+ now required
- Some API signatures changed for type safety

## Performance
- Build time increased by 15% due to type checking
- Runtime performance unchanged
